name: Only The Best
description:
You're trying to gain initiation into The Best Gang, a group of underground cat-snugglers. Their initiation ceremony is surviving three minutes in the streets with some of their toughest. How bad do YOU want to snuggle?!

Created by Thomas Ohashi and Phil Walsh in a little over a week for the GamesPlusJam 2021 event.

Controls:

Left click - Punch / advance dialog

Right click - Kick

R+L click - Use special

Shift - Pause

Space - Jump

Arrow keys / WASD - Move
